verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon Nehiloth <S%H5155><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Give ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%> to my words <S%H561><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, consider <S%H995><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my meditation <S%H1901><s%>.
Hearken <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my cry <S%H7773><s%>, my King <S%H4428><s%>, and my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: for unto thee will I pray <S%H6419><s%> <S%H8691><s%>.

My voice <S%H6963><s%> shalt thou hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>; in the morning <S%H1242><s%> will I direct <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my prayer unto thee, and will look up <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
For thou art not a 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> that hath pleasure <S%H2655><s%> in wickedness <S%H7562><s%>: neither shall evil <S%H7451><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee.

The foolish <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall not stand <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>: thou hatest <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all workers <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>.

Thou shalt destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them that speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> leasing <S%H3577><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> will abhor <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> and deceitful <S%H4820><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

But as for me, I will come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into thy house <S%H1004><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>: and in thy fear <S%H3374><s%> will I worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> toward thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

Lead <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> because of mine enemies <S%H8324><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; make thy way <S%H1870><s%> straight <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8685><s%> before my face <S%H6440><s%>.

For there is no faithfulness <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>; their inward <S%H7130><s%> part is very wickedness <S%H1942><s%>; their throat <S%H1627><s%> is an open <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8803><s%> sepulchre <S%H6913><s%>; they flatter <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with their tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

Destroy <S%H816><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thou them, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>; let them fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by their own counsels <S%H4156><s%>; cast them out <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8685><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of their transgressions <S%H6588><s%>; for they have rebelled <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against thee.

But let all those that put their trust <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in thee rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: let them ever <S%H5769><s%> shout for joy <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, because thou defendest <S%H5526><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them: let them also that love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> be joyful <S%H5970><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in thee.

For thou, YY <S%H3068><s%>, wilt bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; with favour <S%H7522><s%> wilt thou compass <S%H5849><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him as with a shield <S%H6793><s%>.
